entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Addressing mode is not recognized properly #92861
    9.0.0
  • mac m1 build failure #92860
  • Dereference of NULL pointer #92858
  • ResolveField is very slow when debugging #92856

Closed

  • The JIT uses an redundant rbp register #92818
    9.0.0
  • Request to backport JsonDocument thread safety fix to System.Text.Json v7 (PR#76716) #92808
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Deprecate non-generic collections #92640

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Unblock subsequent requests when an async over sync Dns call runs for too long #92863
    area-System.Net
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Update package description used types for System.IO.Hashing #92859
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Call fgRenumberBlocks in optIfConversion #92821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert all remaining tests in the Loader subtree to the merged model #92407
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use UnsafeAccessor in JSHostImplementation instead of reflection #92755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Preinitialize pop/switch/Type.IsValueType #92841
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 117.0.5938.132, windows: 117.0.5938.132 #92854
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve throughput / allocations of JsonNode.GetPath #92284
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Merge stores #92852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove 'tracing' from Native AOT PR runs #92825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Compiler should optimize conversion from boolean to integer #36625
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense not suggesting correct variable #54107
    17.6

Updated

  • Cannot use CSharpScript API with PublishSingleSingle option #50719
    Backlog
  • Conflict between IDE0079 and other rules #70201
  • Strange output for NormalizeWhitespace for `1 is var i` #70135
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Delpoy ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler with compiler #70203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changes to AddCascadingValue do not affect Blazor Server Mode #51054
  • Pass the circuit from the server to the client in Blazor Web for RenderModeServer #51053
  • Minimal API - IFormCollection, IFormFileCollection and IFormFile throw "Invalid anti-forgery token found when reading parameter..." #51052
  • OutputCacheMiddleware changes a response behavior of failed bindings issues #51050
  • Configure BearerTokenOptions when use AddIdentityApiEndpoints API #51047

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext, updates #51037
  • Missing documentation for `StaticWebAssetProjectMode` attribute in ` *.Client.csproj` file #51006

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `e47544a` #51051
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `e47544a` #51049
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2281038 #50997
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can build full screen apps in Windows/Android easily but no method for iOS works #17767
  • [Bug] Unable to set image as ContentPage BackgroundImageSource #17766
  • IOS App Icon no change after publishing #17764
  • Nested Border objects do not layout their Bounds correctly based on expected settings (iOS/Android/Windows) #17763
  • ImageButton does not show the icon on Android in custom control but replacing it with Image control does #17762
  • Nested Border renders top left corner bizarrely wrong with truncation in iOS/Windows (okay in Android) #17761
  • DatePicker date format inconsistent #17760

Closed

  • How to make status bar transparent for Modal Pages #17752

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improves performance on SetterSpecificity and SetterSpecificityList #17756
    community ✨
  • Make sure to account for a null AppWindow #17746
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17749
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Cannot create a DbSet for 'MostExpensiveProduct' because this type is not included in the model for the context. #31424
  • Unable to add data into SQL table - exception thrown, but query works OK #31926
  • Ignore specified query filters #31869
  • Stylecop rulesets are being applied on generated EF bundle and build is failing in gitlab pipleine #31804
  • Much needed #31754
  • ValueObject == null, Property could not be translated #31593
  • Complex type using Ownsone as Primary key #31426
  • 8.0 API Reviews #30306
    8.0.0
  • Ef Core RC1 Sql Server Compiled Model Stackoverflow #31751
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Enforcing usage of FluentAPI instead of attributes #31889
  • TPC does not work "out of the box" with Sqlite #31752
  • Is it possible to define relationships that could reference one of multiple tables without foreign keys? #31913
  • Referencing a third table in `JOIN` clauses #31894
  • Hierarchyid in a parameter collection does not work in 8.0-rc1 with MSSQL #31912
  • Search a table using a list of strings in EF Core 8 preview (where in clause) #31898
  • SQLite affinity fallback is wrong: fallback to blob instead of numeric #31915
  • Is there a way to alter the DbContext configuration after AddDbContext has been called? #31905
  • VB.Net Expression translation causes errors #31878
  • HasConversion<string> from GUID generated migrations contains non existent column called TempId #31860
    Backlog
  • Result of left joining a nullable nominal type should be null (i.e. no instance) and not an instance with all null property values #22517
    Backlog
  • Data inconsistency while loading entities based on new changed prop before SaveChangesInterceptor.SavingChangesAsync #31741
  • Batched queries for explicit loading #31567
    Backlog
  • Store ValueGenerator directly in IProperty runtime annotation instead of ValueGeneratorCache #31901
  • When i compile models, in xxxxxCompliedModelBuilder.cs show "CS0204 Only 65534 locals are allowed" #31370
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Calculate sentinel value inside RuntimeProperty #31923
  • [TEST ONLY] Check if tests have any results rather than looking at entry count #31922

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Mitigation for stack overflow with compiled model on Mac #31896
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Validate single discriminator values #31916
    Servicing-consider
